title: Pixel randomly shuts off
content:
I have a Pixel 1 phone. For the last 2-3 weeks, it has been shutting off randomly even when the battery is 30% or more. This happens especially during calls. It turns on only after plugging into a charger.
Sometimes, the phone shuts off while using other apps like Instagram or bank apps.
Today my phone shut off at 84% battery during an important call. Now it is not even turning on after plugging into a charger. 
Please help, this is the only phone I have.
